reviews.review_text:
Found The Stone House by chance. We were drawn in by the live music & we’re not disappointed. The place had a great atmosphere, the staff were fantastic & the food great & such good value.
Would definitely recommend visiting if you’re in the Candolim area

Located at a prime location, The Stone House Goa is a place with live music and ambience.

We ordered a couple of starters and some main course dishes.

In terms of the starters, the quantity and taste in relation to the price was not worth it.

The mains including thalis and chicken stroganoff were average.

Note: The washroom on the other hand was dirty and didn't even have water.

A Nostalgic retro spot for all Blues & Rock lovers to enjoy a trip down memory lane.
This couple friendly restaurant has a vibe unmatched to many me - too restaurants that have come up recently. It's 30+ years of history keeps it in good company which its peers have readily abandoned to cater to guests who don't care much for the rich & diverse local cultures, tastes & music fare.
The restaurant decor is very vintage & exquisite. For the vibe and the ambience this restaurant has to offer, the food & drinks are competitively priced and tasty. The staff is cordial & quick in its service.
The owner makes it a point to interact with the guests & is eager to attend to them.
Visit for a relaxed evening for some great food, drinks & music that is not loud or garish.
